says: Hybrid Emergency First Aid CPR/AED Level C is ideal for pharmacists, nursing students, school bus drivers, educators, and includes includes 3.5 hours of online, self-lead, video-based modules, followed by a 3.5 hour in-classroom skills assessment.
This certification is valid for 3 years, after which the course will need to be completed in its entirety again for renewal.

Topics covered: Emergency Scene Management and PPE, Cardiopulmonary Resuscitation (CPR) and Automated external defibrillators (AED), Heart, breathing and stroke related emergencies, Wound care, head, neck, spine injuries
How would you like to proceed?
